itemtemplate.name: Acheron %name%
itemtemplate.text:
The black blade of this sword is crafted from a mysterious arcane alloy. You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. While the sword is on your person, you are immune to effects that turn undead.
Dark Blessing: While holding the sword, you can use an action to give yourself 1d4 + 4 temporary hit points. This property can't be used again until the next dusk.
Disheartening Strike: When you hit a creature with an attack using this weapon, you can fill the target with unsettling dread: the target has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn. The creature ignores this effect if it's immune to the frightened condition. Once you use this property, you can't do so again until the next dusk.
itemtemplate.source: Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 265,Wayfinder's Guide to Eberron p. 74

itemtemplate.name: Corpse Slayer %name%
itemtemplate.text: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit an undead creature with an attack using this weapon, the attack deals an extra 1d8 damage of the weapon's type, and the creature has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead until the start of your next turn.

itemtemplate.name: Last Stand %name%
itemtemplate.text: You have a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this armor, which shimmers softly. If you die while wearing the armor, it is destroyed, and each celestial, fey, and fiend with 30 feet of you must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be banished to its home plane of existence, unless it is already there.

itemtemplate.name: %name% of Certain Death
itemtemplate.text: When you damage a creature with an attack using this magic weapon, the target can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn.
